about_the_game:
Welcome to the King of Hearts demo.

Explore the world, meet its inhabitants, consult your advisors, build your kingdom, and try to survive along the way.

Even though this is just a demo, there are numerous endings and story events for you to discover.

Key Features:

  • Forge and govern a kingdom in an alluring dark fantasy realm.

  • Partake in dialogues with both inhabitants and advisors. Unearth the intricate desires and motivations.

  • Take care of your own well-being and psyche, mirrored in the care of your kingdom.

  • Immerse in hand-crafted visuals and beautifull music.

A word of caution:

Please remember that King of Hearts is a fantasy story that can delve into some very dark themes. You always have your "safeword" in the form of the "exit button." This is not our world. The world of King of Hearts operates under different rules and beliefs. It doesn't concern itself with your opinions on what is good or bad, or whether certain concepts are treated with respect. To fully enjoy King of Hearts, you need to immerse yourself and set aside the real world while you play. If you find this difficult, the game may not be an enjoyable experience for you. However, this works both ways. The kingdom has its own set of problems and does not need to be supplemented with reminders of our real world.

That being said, if the paragraph above didn't deter you, enjoy your reign.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains mature themes and content unsuitable for younger audiences. Expect depictions of violence, strong language, and suggestive themes. Additionally, it portrays a distorted view of mental health that do not mirror reality. The fictional world and values presented are unrelated to the real world. Player discretion is advised.

name: King of Hearts Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Welcome to the King of Hearts demo. Explore a world full of choices, meet its inhabitants, and build your kingdom. Immerse yourself, and leave the real world behind. Enjoy your reign.
